attributes.action: stop writing meaningless responses to petitions.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: How many petitions are there on this website that have been replied to in useless politician-speak? All the responses avoid the issue being questioned, rebut points never made in the first place, and ignore the valuable arguments. Can't we have a "you're right, we'll try and change things" once in a while?

rejection.details: Comments about the petitions system should be sent to number10@petitions.pm.gov.uk.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
